author: Not available

text.0: Mec se ueta uong,      uundrum freorig,
text.10: Uil mec huethrae suae      ðeh uidæ ofaer eorðu
text.12: ni anoegun ic me aerigfaerae      egsan brogum,
text.13: ðeh ði n... ...n siæ      niudlicae ob cocrum.
text.2: Ni uaat ic mec biuorthæ      uullan fliusum,
text.4: Uundnae me ni biað ueflæ,      ni ic uarp hafæ,
text.5: ni ðerih ðreatun giðraec      ðret me hlimmith,
text.7: ni mec ouana      aam sceal cnyssa.
text.8: Uyrmas mec ni auefun      uyrdi craeftum,

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
